missionProperties.missionInfo:
{-} Lorn is a Rebel figure controlled by the Rebels as an ally. Lorn cannot suffer {H}.
{-} Lorn does not activate as normal. Instead he performs 1 action at the start of each Status Phase.
{-} If there are no healthy heroes within 3 spaces of Lorn, an Imperial figure can interact with Lorn to arrest him when instructed. When that happens, click the Imperial mission token and select "Lorn arrested".
{-} Walls between 2 rubble tokens do not block movement for figures on 1 of those rubble tokens.
{-} When it is the Rebel's turn to activate a figure, they may instead choose to pass play back to the Imperial player.
{-} The Rebels win at the end of Round 7.
{-} The Rebels lose when Lorn is arrested.

changeRepositionOverride.theText: Be adjacent to Lorn (only figures without "Massive" or "Non-Sentient").

globalEvents.name: Open Crate 1
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
The small diner Lorn chose for your meeting is located in a heavily industrialized part of the planet. The air is choked with smog and soot, making it difficult to spot incoming craft.

To avoid arousing too much suspicion, half of the team remains outside with the speeder while the others go in to make contact. You take a seat in a booth and wait for Lorn to arrive.

After a few beverages that the waitress guilted you into ordering, you grow annoyed that Lorn hasn't arrived. Beginning to think he is not coming at all, you suddenly notice a shady figure in a long coat and dark glasses. You roll your eyes at the obviousness of the
disguise and get up to make contact when your attention is drawn by movement you catch out of the corner of your eye. You realize you have other company as well.

Outside, a low hum grows in intensity just before a glowing orb smashes into your speeder, leaving it a smoldering wreck, Through the haze you see the silhouette of a bomber shuttle circling around for another pass. You activate your emergency beacon to call for extraction, hoping it will arrive in time.

{-} Deploy the Rebels divided as evenly as possible between the 2 blue highlights.

eventActions.theText: Lorn huddles in a corner, shellshocked by the explosion, but slowly coming to his senses.

{-} Place 1 Rebel mission token as shown. This is Lorn.
{-} Lorn is a Rebel figure controlled by the Rebels as an ally. Lorn cannot suffer {H}.
{-} Lorn does not activate as normal. Instead he performs 1 action at the start of each Status Phase.
{-} If there are no healthy heroes within 3 spaces of Lorn, an Imperial figure can interact with Lorn to arrest him when instructed. When that happens, click the Imperial mission token and select "Lorn arrested".
Suddenly, explosions rock the building, and parts of the wall collapse.

entityProperties.name: Rubble 1
entityProperties.theText: {-} Place 1 rubble token on each space here.

entityProperties.name: Rubble 2
entityProperties.theText: {-} Place 1 rubble token on each space here.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Place 1 rubble token on each of the red highlighted spaces.
{-} Walls between 2 rubble tokens do not block movement for figures on 1 of those rubble tokens.

You ready your weapons, hoping that the extraction will arrive soon.

{-} When it is the Rebel's turn to activate a figure, they may instead choose to pass play back to the Imperial player.
{-} The Rebels win at the end of Round 7.
{-} The Rebels lose when Lorn is arrested.
{-} If adjacent to Lorn, and there are no healthy heroes within 3 spaces of Lorn: Arrest Lorn. (Only figures without "Massive" or "Non-Sentient")

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
“Anyone need a lift?” a voice crackles over your comlink. A speeder drops out of the cloud of smog above and weaves its way toward the ground, avoiding fire from the circling bomber. It sets down only long enough for you and Lorn to pile into it before lifting off once more and disappearing into the cloudy haze.

“That was close!” Lorn says, a little too chipper for having just escaped from a war zone, “Thanks for your help! Now Id be glad to return the favor.’

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Heroes receive the “Inside Source” Reward card.
{-} Each hero receives 2 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.
{-} The heroes must choose whether to pursue the artifact with or without Lorn. If the heroes pursue the artifact with Lorn, place Story Mission card “History Repeats” into play. If they pursue it without Lorn, place Story Mission card “Enemies Closer” into play.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
Imperial soldiers close in around Lorn and throw him to the ground, cuffing his hands behind his back. “Help me!” Lorn cries out. “Don't leave me!” Knowing this battle is lost, you push down the feelings of guilt and abandon the poor man, trying not to think about his fate.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Increase the threat level of the next mission (and only the next mission) by 1. During the Rebel Upgrade stage, the Rebel players can decide to spend 50 credits per hero to prevent this.
{-} Each hero receives 2 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: Story 1
globalEvents.eventText:
The Empire decides to pursue the artifact directly, hoping to recover it before the heroes.

{-} Place Story Mission card “Enemies Closer” into play.

globalEvents.name: Story 2
globalEvents.eventText:
Instead of pursuing the artifact directly, the Empire decides to try and sabotage the heroes' efforts, slowing them down.

{-} Place Story Mission card “On the Run” into play.

globalEvents.name: Intrusion
globalEvents.eventText: Military speeders approach, and heavily armored troopers jump out of the transports.

globalEvents.name: On Patrol
globalEvents.eventText: Hearing the commotion around the diner, a Stormtrooper patrol rushes in and immediately joins the fray.

globalEvents.name: Walker Support
globalEvents.eventText:
“You'll never take me alive!” Lorn yells at the Imperials with a laugh as you dispatch another soldier. Just then, you notice a rhythmic rumbling in the ground, accompanied by the thumping steps of an approaching walker. Lorn swallows hard, his confidence gone.

“On second thought...”

enemyGroupData.customText:
{-} CHARGE GENERATORS: If this figure has suffered less than 9 {H}, it gains +2 {H}.
{-} EXPLOSIVE SHOTS: After each attack, place 1 rubble token on the space of the defender. Then, if the defender was adjacent to the wall, also place 1 rubble token on the other side of the wall, if possible.
{Q} Move 1 to attack {rebel}.
{Q} Move 1 to attack {rebel}.
{Q}{A} Move 3 to attack {rebel}.
{A}{A} Move 6 toward {rebel}.
{A} Move 2 toward the closest Rebel.

globalEvents.name: Vile Creatures
globalEvents.eventText: The back walls to the diner burst open as hidden charges detonate. Snarling, Trandoshan mercenaries rush in, their scatterguns drawn.

globalEvents.name: Bombardment 1
globalEvents.eventText:
The bomber shuttle circles around for another pass. Explosions rock the diner.

{-} Place 1 rubble token on each side of the wall between Core 28B and Empire 18B.

globalEvents.name: Bombardment 2
globalEvents.eventText:
The bomber shuttle circles around for another pass. Explosions rock the diner.

{-} Place 1 rubble token on each side of the wall between Core 23B and Empire 6B (lowest possible position).

globalEvents.name: Bombardment 3
globalEvents.eventText:
The bomber shuttle circles around for another pass. Explosions rock the diner.

{-} Place 1 rubble token on the space of the Rebel figure adjacent to the most other Rebel figures. Each Rebel figure on or adjacent to that rubble token suffers 1 {C}. Each figure on that rubble token also suffers 1 {H}.

globalEvents.name: Bombardment 4
globalEvents.eventText:
The bomber shuttle circles around for another pass. Explosions rock the diner.

{-} Place 1 rubble token on the space of the Rebel figure adjacent to the most other Rebel figures. Each Rebel figure on or adjacent to that rubble token suffers 1 {C}. Each figure on that rubble token also suffers 1 {H}.

globalEvents.name: Bombardment 5
globalEvents.eventText: Alarms keep blaring through the streets of Coruscant, alerting the Imperial forces to the scene.

globalEvents.name: Bombardment 6
globalEvents.eventText: Alarms keep blaring through the streets of Coruscant, alerting the Imperial forces to the scene.
